name: Tropical Slope
description:
Tropical Slope is a casual arcade/action game were you have to help a turtle save his little turtle eggs, while sliding downhill using a sandboard (or snowboard for sand). Throughout the progress of the game you’ll have to save a bunch of turtle’s eggs, while performing slalom, avoiding obstacles and even surviving attacks from evil eagles.
HOW TO PLAY

1. Control the turtle just by touching the screen with your finger and move it horizontally to steer towards the desire direction.
2. Progress through various levels to save turtle’s eggs.

3. Avoid enemies and obstacles on each level.
